name: Zenith Steel PEW 20G
description: These cartridges are designed with performance steel shot, making them an excellent choice for hunters seeking a lead alternative. The steel shot ensures excellent velocity and energy transfer, providing effective knock-down power for birds like ducks and pheasants. The 20-gauge size allows for a lighter, more manoeuvrable shooting experience without compromising on effectiveness.

A standout feature of the Zenith Steel Pro Eco Wad is its biodegradable fibre wad, which breaks down naturally, aligning with Eley Hawk's commitment to sustainability. This eco-friendly wad eliminates plastic residue in the environment, making it a responsible choice for game shooters looking to reduce their ecological footprint. With reliable patterns and consistent performance, the 20-gauge Zenith Steel Pro Eco Wad cartridges deliver both environmental benefits and high-level shooting results.
